cms_item.title: Autostore - Footer 6 - Content
cms_item.content:
Sign Up For Newsletter & Get 20% Off On First Order

{{block class="Magento\Newsletter\Block\Subscribe" template="subscribe-footer.phtml"}}

AutoStore a local Sudbury florist has served the Los Angeles area since 2009. When you work with AutoStore, you'll immediately
see why the Magentech family has a reputation for delivering quality, value and service.

cms_item.content: <div class="container"> <div class="row"> <div class="col-lg-3 col-sm-6"> <div class="footer-block"> <div class="footer-block-title">{{trans "Shop faster with the app"}}</div> <div class="footer-block-content footer-app"> <ul> <li> <a href="#"> <img class="mark-lazy" src="{{media url=wysiwyg/app/app-9.png}}" alt="" /> </a> </li> <li> <a href="#"> <img class="mark-lazy" src="{{media url=wysiwyg/app/app-10.png}}" alt="" /> </a> </li> </ul> </div> </div> </div> <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-6"> <div class="footer-block"> <div class="footer-block-title">{{trans "ABOUT Autostore"}}</div> <div class="footer-block-content"> <ul class="links-footer"> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "About Us"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Market Reviews"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Terms of Use"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Privacy Policy"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Site Map"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Sofa & chair"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Home & Kitchens"}}</a> </li> </ul> </div> </div> </div> <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-6"> <div class="footer-block"> <div class="footer-block-title">{{trans "CUSTOMER SERVICE"}}</div> <div class="footer-block-content"> <ul class="links-footer"> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Shipping Policy"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Compensation First"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "My Account"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Return Policy"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Contact Us"}}</a> </li> </ul> </div> </div> </div> <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-6"> <div class="footer-block"> <div class="footer-block-title">{{trans "PAYMENT"}} & {{trans "SHIPPING"}}</div> <div class="footer-block-content"> <ul class="links-footer"> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Terms of Use"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Payment Methods"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Shipping Guide"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Locations We Ship To"}}</a> </li> <li> <a href="#">{{trans "Estimated Delivery Time"}}</a> </li> </ul> </div> </div> </div> <div class="col-lg-3 col-sm-12"> <div class="footer-block newsletter-block"> <div class="footer-block-title">{{trans "Sign Up For Newsletter"}}</div> <div class="footer-block-content"> <p>{{trans "Don't miss out on exciting promotions and the latest shopping news"}}</p> {{block class="Magento\Newsletter\Block\Subscribe" template="subscribe-footer.phtml"}} {{block class="Magento\Framework\View\Element\Template" template="Magento_Theme::html/social.phtml"}} </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>
